page.title: 18 CROYDON HALL
page.content: Croydon Hall is a big boarding school. All the children come from Bristol. The headmaster tries to make the children feel at home . They have a swimming pool and you can see it from one of the boys bedroom window. They are allowed in the swimming pool every evening and afternoon.In the common room there is a carved mantle piece. Each bedroom door has a name. The children decided to call the bedrooms after the names of birds like kingfisher, sparrow, hawk, yellow hammer, humming bird, bluetit and so on. Out of the windows you can see quite a nice view of hills. There are forty one children in the whole school and most of them go home on weekends to their parents. The headmaster takes them in the minibus. Most of the children have a teddy bear or some kind of cuddly toy.
